Classic science fiction action about the prisoner&#039;s island where convicts have divided into two camps of the good guys and the bad guys.

I have uploaded this once before, and thought it deserves a quality rip with all available subs from my DVD.

DVD-rip 2-pass Widescreen 704x384, very good stereo Ac3.
Burn tested, runs well in both my standalone DivX players.
